subject: Playoff Games
Basketball
Athletics and Sports
lead_paragraph: The Nets have held Shaquille O'Neal to modest numbers, yet the Heat has a 3-1 series lead entering Tuesday's game (8 p.m. ET) in Miami.
snippet: The Nets have held Shaquille O'Neal to modest numbers, yet the Heat has a 3-1 series lead entering Tuesday's game (8 p.m. ET) in Miami.
